name: obsidian-calendar-pro-plugin
description: Calendar Pro is a plugin for Obsidian that provides a view of calendar and create daily/weekly/monthly/quarterly/yearly notes.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-to-vault
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: RayZhao98
